txt.en:
'Do you think that was all of them, [placeholder]? I am weary, but I could stand another attack.

'I wonder who leads this rabble.

'I think I am all right. What of Wynmar? He looks tired to my eyes.'

'I suppose it is time to let her go. I must. But... this all just seems so wrong now.\n\n'Why did this happen, [placeholder]? Have you ever felt this backwards sense that your life was fine until you met someone you could not have, then nothing would ever be as it should again?'
Instance: The Orcs Attack
'What is going on?'

'He is poisoned, [placeholder]! I was coming to make amends for my coldness from our earlier meeting... if only I had been one moment sooner!\n\n'There is nothing I can do. It will not be long now. Poor Wynmar!'
Noriel has slain the attacker, but Wynmar lies wounded
'Let us say our good-byes, dear friend....'
Too many have died...
Wynmar, Rothulf, and the other Rohirrim hunters now brace themselves against an onslaught.
Rothulf and Wynmar are at their camp in Thinglad.
Rothulf and Wynmar are at their camp in Thinglad.
Orcs are attacking! You must defeat them.
Rothulf is at the camp.
Wynmar is at his camp.
Noriel and Wynmar are speaking quietly between themselves.
Noriel is tending to Wynmar's wounds.
Talk to Rothulf
Help Rothulf rouse Wynmar from his woe
See if Wynmar is ready to fight
Defeat the attacking Orcs
Talk to Rothulf
Talk to Wynmar
See if Wynmar and Noriel need your help
Ask Noriel if Wynmar will live
The Orcs have begun their attack on the Rohirrim's vulnerable encampment in Thinglad.
'They are coming any moment, [placeholder]. I can sense it... we must wake Wynmar from this foolish stupour, or he will surely die in this battle!'
